name: The Storm's Edge
description:
Description

A terrible storm is coming. Guide a nomadic crew and their boss towards safety as you fight for survival in a harsh and forgotten wasteland.

Whatever you do. Don't get caught.


Game made during VimJam 2 [8 Bits to Infinity]

Theme of the jam: ON THE EDGE

Limitation of the jam: Boss

Instructions


Controls

Left mouse button on a character whose turn it is to move.

Hold the left mouse button on a tile to show its name and harvest/interaction cost.

Use the buttons on the right to skip the character's turn or interact with the tile the character is standing on.

F11 to toggle fullscreen.
